Recent updates in New York City include the recovery of over $1M in fentanyl from a Bronx apartment, a missing 9-month-old in a custodial interference case, and a significant nurse strike impacting healthcare services, alongside ongoing discussions about environmental initiatives and public safety measures like increased red-light cameras.

### Risks & Alerts

- Over $1M of fentanyl recovered from packaging mill in Bronx apartment building. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- Missing 9-month-old taken in Bronx custodial interference incident: NYPD seeks public assistance.
